DESCRIPTION:
Feel the genuine fear in the world of Alien: Isolation - thriller with an atmosphere of terror and deadly threat. 15 years after the events of Alien â„¢ daughter Ellen Ripley, Amanda begins to look for the true cause of the disappearance of the mother and enters fight for survival.
